title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
writer: Sanjay Leela Bhansali, Abhiruchi Chand, Saurabh H. Dikshit
short_cast: Alia Bhatt, Vijay Raaz, Seema Pahwa, Ajay Devgn, Jim Sarbh, Chhaya Kadam, Shantanu Maheshwari, Indira Tiwari
cast: Alia Bhatt, Vijay Raaz, Seema Pahwa, Ajay Devgn, Jim Sarbh, Chhaya Kadam, Shantanu Maheshwari, Indira Tiwari
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Hindi-Language Movies, Movies Based on Books, Dramas
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: Duped and sold to a brothel, a young woman fearlessly reclaims her power, using underworld connections to preside over the world she was once a pawn in.
